Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

The first instance of "IDT" is not a valid Material Name entity as it is not a material name, but rather an abbreviation for a property (high mobility). The second instance of "IDT" is a valid Material Name entity as it is modified by the phrase "based polymers" which indicates that it is a material name.
